full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I GTOR CHOG DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I GTOR CHOG DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG BYIN RLABS CAN DU MA YOD BZHIN DU, YAN LAG BRGYAD LDAN RGYA MTSO GRAM DU BA TSA'I KHRON PA BRKO BA'I DAL BA 'DI 'DRA MI DGOS 'DUG KYANG, RANG GI GAM DU GNAS PA'I MCHOD SPON BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS, MGON PO'I MNGON RTOGS, BSKANG BSHAGS, BZLAS PA, GTOR 'BUL, BSTOD BSKUL SOGS CHA TSANG ZHING, TSIG NYUNG BA RGYUN KHYER DU BYED @010B RGYU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, BSKANGS BSHAGS GNYIS RJE BLA MA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS MDZAD PA DANG, BSTOD PA RNYING PA GZHIR BZHAG ,GZHAN RNAMS TSIG SBYOR GSAR DU BGYIS TE BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS SKYED TSAL YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL DU SBYAR BA'I DGE BA'I YE SHES MGON POS RJES SU 'DZIN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
